body_html:
You need to set these

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L1462-L1483

And additionally

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L872
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L883
...

There even some new variables like TF_NEED_KAFKA which are not in the gist.

Just grep for environ_cp.get in configure.py. I will update the gist.

body:
You need to set these

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L1462-L1483

And additionally

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L872
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L883
...

There even some new variables like [`TF_NEED_KAFKA`](
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L1466) which are not in the gist.

Just grep for `environ_cp.get` in `configure.py`. I will update the gist.
